item.description:
***NOTE NEW DATE! Due to a change in the home owner's plans, we have to move this out one week to SATURDAY DECEMBER 8TH***

Join us for a field trip / one-day workshop to Hope, Maine (about 1.75 h from Portland) to the home/farm of our biodynamic farmer friend, Tom Griffin. Charles & Julia Yelton will be our instructors as we learn about and install Tom's PV system for his off-the-grid cabin.

Google Map for the location:
http://maps.google.co...


This course will run from 10:00am to about 4:00pm (+/-). The workshop fee is $50 which includes lunch, handouts and our instructor fees. There is a $10 concession for students/seniors. The course is limited to about 8 students.

Optional/possible extra activities: We may also be looking at Tom's wind generation equipment and the cool cupboard he's planning to install.

CARPOOL INFO: We will meet at the Marginal Way park-and-ride at 8:00 for an 8:15 departure.

TO REGISTER: Send a check for $50 made out to "Portland Maine Permaculture" c/o Lisa Fernandes, 1002 Sawyer Road, Cape Elizabeth, ME 04107 to hold your spot.

RAIN/SNOW/SLUSH DATE: Sunday, December 9th - same time. Dress for the temperature, otherwise!
